languages.text: Пульт управления разбит — машинный дух покинул эту машину навсегда.
The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.
languages.original_text: Пульт управления разбит — машинный дух покинул эту машину навсегда.

traits.locale_text: The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.
The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.
The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.
The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.
The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.

languages.text: 控制面板已经碎了，机魂已经永远离开了这台机器。
languages.original_text: The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.

traits.locale_text: 控制面板已经碎了，机魂已经永远离开了这台机器。

languages.text: El panel de control está roto. El espíritu máquina ha abandonado permanentemente esta máquina.
languages.original_text: The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.

traits.locale_text: El panel de control está roto. El espíritu máquina ha abandonado permanentemente esta máquina.

languages.text: コントロールパネルは壊れている――機械精霊がこの機械に帰ってくることはもうない。
languages.original_text: The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.

traits.locale_text: コントロールパネルは壊れている――機械精霊がこの機械に帰ってくることはもうない。

languages.text: Das Bedienfeld ist kaputt – der Maschinengeist hat diese Maschine für immer verlassen.
languages.original_text: The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.

traits.locale_text: Das Bedienfeld ist kaputt – der Maschinengeist hat diese Maschine für immer verlassen.

languages.text: Le panneau de contrôle est cassé. L'esprit de la machine l'a quittée pour toujours.
languages.original_text: The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.

traits.locale_text: Le panneau de contrôle est cassé. L'esprit de la machine l'a quittée pour toujours.

languages.text: Kontrol paneli kırılmış. Makine ruhu, bu makineyi sonsuza dek terk etmiş.
languages.original_text: The control panel is broken — the machine spirit has left this machine forever.

traits.locale_text: Kontrol paneli kırılmış. Makine ruhu, bu makineyi sonsuza dek terk etmiş.
